name: Juggernaut
desc: Juggernaut champions take less damage as their Health decreases.

name: Yordle
desc:
Your units gain 10% Attack Speed per star level.

If you have three 3-star champions, your Yordles can become 4-star, which gives their Ability a wacky upgrade!
abstract: bond:AS per star level:(10%); 3-star Yordle upgrade:(1/2)

name: Bastion
desc: Bastion champions gain Armor and Magic Resist. This is increased by 100% for the first 10 seconds of combat.

name: Bruiser
desc: Your units gain 100 Health. Bruiser get even more.

name: Challenger
desc: Challengers gain bonus Attack Speed. When their target dies, Challengers dash to a new target and increase their Attack Speed bonus by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

name: Deadeye
desc:
Innate: +1 Range

Every 3 seconds, Deadeyes attack the enemy with the highest percent Health and deal bonus damage.

name: Demacia
desc:
At the start of each planning phase, a number of your strongest Demacians become elites, equipping a random Radiant Item until the end of the next combat, and giving themselves and nearby allies Armor and Magic Resistance. (Does not stack.)

Radiant items are upgraded versions of completed items.

name: Freljord
desc:
After 8 seconds, a Freljordian storm strikes the battelfield. Enemies take a percentage of their maximum health as true damage and gain debuffs for 10 seconds.

Sunder: reduce Armor
Shred: reduce Magic Resist
Mana Reave: increase maximum mana until the next cast
stats: 5% health, enemies are 40% Sundered and Shredded
10% health, enemies are also 30% Mana Reaved
15% health, enemies enemies are also stunned for 1.5 seconds

name: Ionia
desc:
Every 4 seconds, your strongest Ionians are enlightened to their spirit form and gain 20 Mana.

Each Ionian has a unique bonus within their ability, which doubles when in spirit form.

name: Gunner
desc: When Gunner champions attack, they gain bonus Attack Damage, up to 8 stacks.

name: Multicaster
desc: Multicasters cast their Ability multiple times. Bonus casts have 66% reduced effectiveness.

name: Noxus
desc: Noxus units gain Health, Ability Power and Attack Damage. This is increased by 5% for each different opponent that either you have conquered in combat or is dead.

name: Piltover
desc: Gain the T-Hex. Every time you lose a combat, the T-Hex gains a Charge. Winning releases the Charges, granting the T-Hex power based on the amount released.
stats: Gain bonus loot every round. Each loss counts as 2 losses instead.
abstract: 总结为 bond:T-Hex:(//); bond:bonus loot:(//), loss counts as 2

name: Invoker
desc: Allies restore Mana every 3 seconds.
stats: 20 Mana for all allies and 15 additional Mana for Invokers

name: Rogue
stats: The first time Rogues fall below 50% Health they briefly become untargetable and dash towards an enemy within 4 hexes, preferring backliners.
Additionally, attacking an enemy for the first time causes that enemy to bleed, dealing 50% of their max Health as magic damage over 5 seconds.

name: Shadow Isles
desc: After dealing or receiving damage 10 times, Shadow Isles unit gain a Shield for 15 seconds and become Spectral for the rest of combat. Spectral units gain Mana every second.

name: Shurima
desc: Every 4 seconds, Shuriman heal 5% max Health. After 8 seconds, select Shruiman ascend and gain 33% max Health and 45% Attack Speed.
stats: Instead, Ascend at combat start. +25% Ascension bonus
Ascend twice, at combat start and after 8 seconds. +25% Ascension bonus

name: Slayer
desc: Slayers gain 12% omnivamp. Additionally, Slayers deal bonus damage, doubled against units below 66% health.

name: Sorcerer
desc:
Sorcerers gain bonus Ability Power.

When an enemy dies after being damaged by a Sorcerer, they deal a percentage of that enemy's maximum Health to another enemy.

name: Strategist
desc: Combat Start: Allies in the front 2 rows gain a shield for 15 seconds. Allies in the back 2 rows gain Ability Power.

name: Targon
desc: Your healing and shielding is increased.

name: Void
desc: Void units create a void egg. Once your team loses 40% of their health, the egg hatches into a creature, knocking up nearby units. Each Void unit star level increases the summon's health and AP by 25%.
abstract: 总结为 bond:summon:(Void Remora/Rift Herald/Baron Nashor),star+25%HP/AP

name: Zaun
desc: Zaun champions create random chem-mods that only they can use. Champions can be modded once, and mods can only be removed by selling the champion.
